price: 20. Usuk sinam laaracak hadiffi haah gomboh ken qida, usun laqiibak tewqe tamiirah (nakilih) inna luk raaqan.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
